basics.Name: Deepak Angamuthu
basics.summary: As an accomplished civil Engineer with six years of hands-on experience in overseeing construction projects and ensuring their successful completion I have developed a robust foundation in project management design and quality control Leveraging this background I transitioned to a dynamic role as an ERP Consultant and SQL Report Writer accumulating two years of expertise in optimizing business processes and data reporting solutions

highlights: Proficient in writing complex SQL queries to extract data from relational databases.
• Use SQL SELECT statements to filter, sort, and aggregate data as needed for reporting.
• Have a strong understanding of the underlying database structure and relationships.
• Familiarity with database design principles and normalization.
• Design and structure reports to present data in a meaningful and understandable format.
• Consider user requirements and business needs when designing report layouts.
• Implement parameters in reports to allow users to customize and filter data based on their requirements.
• Conduct thorough analysis of the organization's business processes and requirements.
• Identify opportunities for improvement and automation through ERP solutions.
• Develop a comprehensive implementation plan, considering timelines, resources, and budget constraints.
• Oversee the migration of data from existing systems to the ERP platform.
• Ensure seamless data flow and communication between different systems.

education.institution: Sree Sastha Institute of Engineering and Technology
